00012 float calculAccelerationRot (float pEcart,float  pDistanceTheorique)
00013 {
00014   float localSpeed=0,localDistance=0,t,localDecceleration;
00015   robot * Robot;
00016 
00017   // useless to do more things
00018   if ( pDistanceTheorique == 0)
00019   {
00020     return pEcart;
00021   }   
00022   
00023   Robot = getRobot();
00024   localSpeed = Robot->speedConsigneRot;
00025  // localSpeed = Robot->speed;
00026   if(pDistanceTheorique > 0)
00027   {
00028     localDecceleration = -Robot->accelerationRot;
00029   }
00030   else
00031   {
00032     localDecceleration = Robot->accelerationRot;
00033   }
00034 
00035   t = -localSpeed/localDecceleration;
00036   localDistance = localDecceleration * t*t/2 + localSpeed*t;
00037   
00038   if (localDistance > 0 )
00039   {
00040     // si on doit ralentir la rotation
00041     if (localDistance >= pDistanceTheorique) 
00042     {
00043      if ( Robot->rotationMode == ROTATION_IN_PLACE ) 
00044      {
00045        //phase de freinage
00046        Robot->speedConsigneRot += localDecceleration;
00047        if (Robot->speedConsigneRot < 0.0004)
00048        {
00049          Robot->speedConsigneRot = 0;
00050        }
00051        return pEcart-(pDistanceTheorique - Robot->speedConsigneRot);
00052      }  
00053     }
00054   }
00055   if (localDistance < 0 )
00056   {
00057     if (localDistance <= pDistanceTheorique ) 
00058     {
00059      //phase de freinage
00060      if ( Robot->rotationMode == ROTATION_IN_PLACE ) 
00061      {
00062        Robot->speedConsigneRot += localDecceleration;
00063        if (Robot->speedConsigneRot > -0.0004)
00064        {
00065          Robot->speedConsigneRot = 0;
00066        }
00067        return pEcart-(pDistanceTheorique - Robot->speedConsigneRot);
00068       }
00069     }
00070   }  
00071 // phase d'acceleration ou de vitesse constante
00072   if (( Robot->speedConsigneRot < Robot->speedRotMax) && (pDistanceTheorique > 0))
00073   {
00074     // phase d'acceleration
00075     Robot->speedConsigneRot += Robot->accelerationRot;
00076     // prevent overspeed
00077     if (Robot->speedConsigneRot > Robot->speedRotMax)
00078     {
00079       Robot->speedConsigneRot = Robot->speedRotMax;
00080     }  
00081   }
00082   // for acceleration in reverse way
00083   else if (( Robot->speedConsigne > -Robot->speedRotMax) && (pDistanceTheorique < 0))
00084   {
00085     // phase d'acceleration
00086     Robot->speedConsigneRot -= Robot->accelerationRot;
00087     // prevent overspeed
00088     if ( Robot->speedConsigneRot < -Robot->speedRotMax)
00089     {
00090       Robot->speedConsigneRot = -Robot->speedRotMax;
00091     }  
00092   } 
00093   return pEcart-(pDistanceTheorique - Robot->speedConsigneRot);
00094 }

00097 float calculAcceleration (float pEcart,float pDistanceTheorique)
00098 {
00099   float localSpeed=0,localDistance=0,t,localDecceleration;
00100   float rotationDeBase;
00101   robot * Robot;
00102 
00103   // useless to do more things
00104   if ( pDistanceTheorique == 0)
00105   {
00106     return pEcart;
00107   }  
00108    
00109   Robot = getRobot();
00110   rotationDeBase = calculEcart_rot(Robot->nextTarget);
00111   localSpeed = Robot->speedConsigne;
00112  // localSpeed = Robot->speed;
00113   if(Robot->speedMax > 0)
00114   {
00115     localDecceleration = Robot->decceleration;
00116   }
00117   else if(Robot->speedMax < 0)
00118   {
00119     localDecceleration = -Robot->decceleration;
00120   }
00121   else  // speedMax= 0 Brake 
00122   {
00123     // a bit incorrect to check deceleration sens with the curent consigne
00124     if (localSpeed > 0)
00125     {
00126      localDecceleration = -10.0;
00127     }
00128     else
00129     {
00130      localDecceleration = 10.0;
00131     } 
00132   }  
00133   
00134   // Calcul de la vitesse et du temps nécessaires à l'arrêt
00135   t = -localSpeed/localDecceleration;
00136   localDistance = localDecceleration * t*t/2 + localSpeed*t;
00137   
00138   if (localDistance > 0 )
00139   {
00140     // si le dernier point est atteint
00141     if (localDistance >= pDistanceTheorique) 
00142     {
00143      if (((Robot->target.x == Robot->nextTarget.x) && (Robot->target.y == Robot->nextTarget.y)) || (fabsf(rotationDeBase) > PI/2) ) 
00144      {
00145        //phase de freinage
00146        Robot->speedConsigne += Robot->decceleration;
00147        if (Robot->speedConsigne < 1)
00148        {
00149          Robot->speedConsigne = 0;
00150        }
00151        return pEcart-(pDistanceTheorique - Robot->speedConsigne);
00152      }  
00153     }
00154   }
00155   if (localDistance < 0 )
00156   {
00157     if (localDistance <= pDistanceTheorique ) 
00158     {
00159      //phase de freinage
00160      if (((Robot->target.x == Robot->nextTarget.x) && (Robot->target.y == Robot->nextTarget.y)) || (fabsf(rotationDeBase) > PI/2) )
00161      {
00162        Robot->speedConsigne -= Robot->decceleration;
00163        if (Robot->speedConsigne > -1)
00164        {
00165          Robot->speedConsigne = 0;
00166        }
00167        return pEcart-(pDistanceTheorique - Robot->speedConsigne);
00168       }
00169     }
00170   }  
00171 // phase d'acceleration ou de vitesse constante
00172   if ( Robot->speedConsigne < Robot->speedMax)
00173   {
00174     // phase d'acceleration
00175     Robot->speedConsigne+=Robot->acceleration;
00176     // prevent overspeed
00177     if (Robot->speedConsigne > Robot->speedMax)
00178     {
00179       Robot->speedConsigne = Robot->speedMax;
00180     }  
00181   }
00182   // for acceleration in reverse way
00183   else if ( Robot->speedConsigne > Robot->speedMax)
00184   {
00185     // phase d'acceleration
00186     Robot->speedConsigne-=Robot->acceleration;
00187     // prevent overspeed
00188     if ( Robot->speedConsigne < Robot->speedMax)
00189     {
00190       Robot->speedConsigne = Robot->speedMax;
00191     }  
00192   } 
00193   return pEcart-(pDistanceTheorique - Robot->speedConsigne);
00194   
00195 }

00198 float decreaseDistanceTheorique (float pDistanceTheorique)
00199 {
00200   robot * Robot;
00201   Robot = getRobot();
00202   
00203   
00204   if (pDistanceTheorique > 0)
00205   {
00206     pDistanceTheorique -= Robot->speedConsigne;
00207     if ( pDistanceTheorique < 1 ) 
00208     {
00209       pDistanceTheorique = 0;
00210       Robot->speedConsigne = 0;
00211     }   
00212   }
00213   else  if (pDistanceTheorique < 0)
00214   {
00215     pDistanceTheorique -= Robot->speedConsigne;
00216     if ( pDistanceTheorique > -1 ) 
00217     {
00218       pDistanceTheorique = 0;
00219       Robot->speedConsigne = 0; 
00220     } 
00221   }
00222    
00223   return pDistanceTheorique; 
00224 }

00226 float decreaseRotationTheorique (float pRotationTheorique)
00227 {
00228   robot * Robot;
00229   Robot = getRobot();
00230   
00231 
00232   if (pRotationTheorique > 0)
00233   {
00234     pRotationTheorique -= Robot->speedConsigneRot;
00235     if ( pRotationTheorique < 0.002 ) 
00236     {
00237       pRotationTheorique = 0;
00238     }
00239   }
00240   else if (pRotationTheorique < 0)
00241   {
00242     pRotationTheorique -= Robot->speedConsigneRot;
00243     if ( pRotationTheorique > -0.002 ) 
00244     {  
00245       pRotationTheorique = 0;
00246     } 
00247   }
00248    
00249   return pRotationTheorique; 
00250 }

00252 void asservissementVitesse(float * ecart_d,float * ecart_rot)
00253 {
00254   robot * Robot;
00255   
00256   static uInt16 lastTimeWasRotation = 0;
00257   // RECUPERATION DES PARAMETRES DU ROBOT
00258   Robot = getRobot();
00259   
00260   // CALCUL DE LA CONSIGNE DE VITESSE
00261   //erreur_d = ecart_d - (Robot->timeGiven * Robot->speedConsigne);
00262   //*ecart_rot -= (Robot->timeGivenRot * Robot->speedConsigneRot);
00263   *ecart_rot = calculAccelerationRot(*ecart_rot,gRotationTheorique);
00264   gRotationTheorique = decreaseRotationTheorique(gRotationTheorique);
00265   // verification du sens de deplacement
00266   if (*ecart_d * Robot->speedMax > 0)
00267     {
00268       //verification du temps imparti pour realiser l'action
00269       if (gRotationTheorique != 0)
00270         {
00271           *ecart_d = 0;
00272           distanceTheorique = 0;
00273           lastTimeWasRotation = 1; 
00274         }
00275       else
00276         {
00277           static uInt16 bascule = 0;
00278           // if rotation is over, compute the new distance to run
00279           if (Robot->rotationMode == ROTATION_DISABLE )
00280             {
00281               if (bascule == 0)
00282                 {
00283                   distanceTheorique = calculConsigne_d(Robot->target);
00284                   bascule = 1;
00285                 }  
00286             }
00287           else
00288             {
00289               bascule = 0;
00290             }
00291           
00292                 if (lastTimeWasRotation)
00293             {
00294               distanceTheorique = calculConsigne_d(Robot->target);
00295               if(Robot->speedMax > 0)
00296                 { 
00297                   Robot->speedConsigne = fabs(Robot->speedConsigneRot) * Robot->entraxe / PI;
00298                 }
00299               else if (Robot->speedMax < 0)
00300                 {
00301                   Robot->speedConsigne = -fabs(Robot->speedConsigneRot) * Robot->entraxe / PI;
00302                 }
00303               if (Robot->rotationMode == ROTATION_DISABLE )
00304                 {
00305                   Robot->speedConsigne = 0;
00306                 }  
00307               lastTimeWasRotation = 0;
00308             }
00309           Robot->speedConsigneRot = 0;
00310           gRotationTheorique = 0;
00311           if (orientationHack())
00312             {
00313               distanceTheorique = 0;
00314               *ecart_d = 0;
00315             }   
00316           else
00317             {
00318               *ecart_d = calculAcceleration(*ecart_d,distanceTheorique);
00319               distanceTheorique = decreaseDistanceTheorique(distanceTheorique);
00320             }  
00321         }  
00322     }
